columns.name: Pclass
columns.notes: Ticket class 1 = 1st, 2 = 2nd, 3 = 3rd. A proxy for socio-economic status (SES): 1st = Upper, 2nd = Middle, 3rd = Lower

columns.name: Age
columns.notes: Age is fractional if less than 1. If the age is estimated, is it in the form of xx.5

columns.name: SibSp
columns.notes:
The dataset defines family relations in this way...
Sibling = brother, sister, stepbrother, stepsister
Spouse = husband, wife (mistresses and fiances were ignored)

columns.name: Parch
columns.notes:
The dataset defines family relations in this way...
Parent = mother, father
Child = daughter, son, stepdaughter, stepson
Some children travelled only with a nanny, therefore parch=0 for them.

columns.name: Embarked
columns.notes: Port of Embarkation C = Cherbourg, Q = Queenstown, S = Southampton
